question: 一本気
sourceMnemonic: You have only <kanji>one</kanji> <kanji>book</kanji> <kanji>energy</kanji>. No other books cross your mind. Only this one book. Why? Because you have such a <vocabulary>one track mind</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading is based off the on'yomi readings for everything, though every reading is slightly altered. <ja>いち</ja> getting shortened to <ja>いっ</ja>, <ja>ほん</ja> changing to <ja>ぽん</ja>, and <ja>き</ja> gets changed to <ja>ぎ</ja>. They're based off the readings you know already, though, so making this shift shouldn't be too hard... that is, unless you have an <ja>一本気</ja>, ammiright?
